alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Stanton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 6:50AM CDT until June 22 at 7:30AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Hamilton County in southwestern Kansas... Western Stanton County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 730 AM CDT/630 AM MDT/. * At 650 AM CDT/550 AM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 18 miles south of Holly, or 20 miles southwest of Coolidge, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Hamilton and western Stanton Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
